testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin) I should be able to access the list of blood types registered in the system via API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request that does not contain valid authorization information and data (id) is sent to the

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. JSON path message doesn't match. Expected: No id or wrong id. Actual: No id or wrong id. Please check your id number.

testcase.failure:
* The api user sets "api/getNoticeById" path parameters.....................passed * The api user prepares a GET request that does not contain data............passed * The api user sends a GET request and saves the returned response..........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 203.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "No id or wrong id."..failed
